products.title: Zumba Pastel Pink Curtain
products.metadescription: Zumba pastel pink curtain in yellow/pink/multicoloured. Made to measure from 24.42 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The zumba pastel pink curtain offers a big and bold 70s inspired pattern printed in a range of soft pastel tones that are totally on-trend. This charming 100% cotton curtain is decorated with large blooms in shades of pink and red with blue and green accents. This bright and beautiful curtain will bring charm and colour to any space. 
 
 Product id: db-cur1198 fabric colour: pastel pink material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Velvet Petal Pink Curtain
products.metadescription: Velvet petal pink curtain in pink. Made to measure from 24.42 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s.
 This soft curtainin petal pink, adds a light pink hue to your home. A soft pink shade creates feeling passion and creativity, this velvet pink curtain creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 At swift direct blinds, not only is this curtainmade by the experts at their yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, their curtainsare made to last. Their curtainscome with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service! 
 
 Product id: db-cur1248 fabric colour: petal pink material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes
